item.title: Insights from Learning Helm: Managing Apps on Kubernetes
item.description: 2021 by Matt Butcher, Matt Farina & Josh Dolitsky Learning Helm: Managing Apps on Kubernetes Overview I remember the first time I dived into Kubernetes; it felt like stepping into a new world. There were so many moving parts, and I quickly realised the need for effective tools to manage it all. This is where “Learning Helm” by Matt Butcher, Matt Farina, and Josh Dolitsky comes in. The book serves as a comprehensive guide to using Helm, the package manager for Kubernetes.
